channel.title: [508]Adding Global Objects?[508]
channel.description:
Source: ScapeRune Source v2. Client: Scaperune Client 508. ---------------------------- i read the tutorial that was posted on the 'help' section of the forums, but it said look in 'frame.java' and it didn't help.. in the source, their is NO frame.java. i was wondering, if anyone had any idea on how to add/move around global objects with this problem. all help is needed :) thanks!
-assassin

item.title: [508]Adding Global Objects?[508]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

Source: ScapeRune Source v2.
Client: Scaperune Client 508.

i read the tutorial that was posted on the ‘help’ section of the forums, but it said look in ‘frame.java’ and it didn’t help… in the source, their is NO frame.java. i was wondering, if anyone had any idea on how to add/move around global objects with this problem. all help is needed thanks!

-assassin
